org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class HostDynamicWorkload

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Host
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.HostDynamicWorkload
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PowerHost

    public class HostDynamicWorkload
extends Host
    The class of a host supporting dynamic workloads and performance degradation.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
    Author:
    Anton Beloglazov

      • updateVmsProcessing

        public double updateVmsProcessing(double currentTime)
        Description copied from class: Host
        Requests updating of processing of cloudlets in the VMs running in this host.
        Overrides:
        updateVmsProcessing in class Host
        Parameters:
        currentTime - the current time
        Returns:
        expected time of completion of the next cloudlet in all VMs in this host. Double.MAX_VALUE if there is no future events expected in this host
